publications.title: Advanced Construction Materials for Sustainable Infrastructure
publications.abstract: This study presents novel construction materials for sustainable infrastructure development, focusing on durability and environmental impact.

publications.title: Remote Sensing Applications in Civil Engineering
publications.abstract: This paper explores the application of remote sensing technologies in civil engineering projects, including structural monitoring and assessment.
publications.funding: Korea Institute of Civil Engineering and Building Technology

publications.title: Structural Health Monitoring Using IoT Sensors
publications.journal: Journal of the Korean Society of Civil Engineers
publications.abstract: This study presents a comprehensive framework for structural health monitoring using Internet of Things (IoT) sensors in civil infrastructure.
publications.funding: Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport

publications.title: Smart Materials for Next-Generation Construction
publications.journal: Proceedings of the International Conference on Smart Materials and Structures
publications.abstract: This conference paper presents the development and application of smart materials in construction for enhanced structural performance.
publications.funding: Korea Research Institute of Standards and Science

publications.title: Durability Assessment of Concrete Structures Using Non-Destructive Testing
publications.abstract: This study presents a comprehensive approach for durability assessment of concrete structures using various non-destructive testing methods.

publications.title: Machine Learning Applications in Construction Material Quality Control
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Co-author 1, Co-author 2, Co-author 3, Co-author 4
publications.abstract: This paper presents machine learning algorithms for automated quality control in construction material production and testing.
